vehicles.description: A white SUV is parked to the right of our car, close to some construction barriers, facing away from our car.
vehicles.explanation: This car appears not to be moving, but caution is advised in case it starts to merge into traffic.

vehicles.description: A white car is right in front of my car.
vehicles.explanation: This vehicle appears to have stopped, and its stationary position directly in front of this car is affecting our immediate driving route, necessitating that we either stop or change lanes to avoid a collision.

vulnerable_road_users.description: On the left side of the construction fence, two workers can be seen wearing high-visibility jackets and helmets, actively engaged in construction work.
vulnerable_road_users.explanation: These individuals were not standing directly on the road, but their proximity and level of activity suggested that self-driving cars should remain alert when passing by, in case they step onto the road or make unexpected moves.

traffic signs.description: A series of red and white construction warning signs and obstacles ahead indicate that there may be road construction or changes in traffic flow.
traffic signs.explanation: Due to construction work, lane routes and traffic patterns may temporarily change, and autonomous vehicles need to drive cautiously to avoid these areas.

traffic signs.description: The sign on the left side of the road indicates a left turn at the intersection ahead.
traffic signs.explanation: These signs alert the driver to the upcoming road layout and potential changes in the traveling direction.

traffic signs.description: Near the road workers, there is a yellow sign with a black symbol, indicating that there may be construction or road works ahead.
traffic signs.explanation: This sign alerts drivers to be aware of potential dangers or changes in road conditions ahead.

barriers.description: Red plastic barriers are placed to guide vehicles through the construction area, with metal fences surrounding the site nearby.
barriers.explanation: These obstacles delineate the construction area and the path the vehicle itself can travel, indicating where it can and cannot enter.

barriers.description: A white car in front of a red and white striped barrier.
barriers.explanation: Barriers control access to the area beyond the checkpoint, meaning autonomous vehicles must wait for the barriers to open before they can proceed.

barriers.description: A temporary barrier has been set up in the middle of the road, extending all the way to the construction site.
barriers.explanation: These obstacles represent the physical barriers that the autonomous vehicle must safely navigate around.

other objects.description: On the right-hand edge of the panoramic view, there is a tree, but it does not obstruct the road or the path of our vehicle.
other objects.explanation: This tree does not directly affect driving behavior, but it provides background information for the environment.

general_perception.description and explanation:
The traffic scene includes various elements affecting driving. There are two vehicles; a white SUV parked on the right side near some construction barriers, facing away, which could merge into traffic unexpectedly, and a white car stopped directly in front of us, affecting our immediate route by making us stop or change lanes to avoid a collision.

On the left side of the construction fence, two workers in high-visibility jackets are engaged in construction, requiring passing cars to stay alert. Multiple traffic signs are present; construction warning signs ahead suggest possible road work or altered traffic flow, a sign indicating a left turn at the upcoming intersection, and a yellow sign warning of construction or road works ahead, prompting drivers to be cautious of potential hazards or changes in road conditions.

Red plastic barriers, metal fences, and a temporary barrier in the middle of the road are set to guide vehicles through the construction area and control access, delineating where vehicles can go and indicating that they must navigate around them safely.

Finally, there is a tree on the right-hand side of the view, but it does not obstruct the road or influence our driving path, merely adding to the environment's context. Traffic lights and traffic cones are not present in this image.

driving_suggestion: Due to the construction area, please drive carefully, adjust your speed accordingly, and pay close attention to any sudden movements of stationary vehicles and construction workers. If a worker enters the road or needs to navigate around obstacles such as construction fences, be prepared to stop or give way. Keep a safe distance from parked vehicles and remain alert for signs that these vehicles might join the traffic flow. Approach checkpoints slowly, be ready to stop behind the white line, and wait for the fence to open before continuing. While waiting, the driver should watch for any signals or directions from checkpoint personnel, or any additional signs that may provide further instructions on how to pass through the checkpoint. Drivers should also observe lane markings and follow designated lanes according to the intended direction. Due to lane closures or detours indicated by traffic cones and barriers, slow down and be prepared to change lanes if necessary. If workers near the road enter the driving lane, maintain a cautious speed. Continue to monitor any changes in the behavior of stationary vehicles and moving vehicles in the distance, as these changes may affect the driving scenario.

1.description and explanation: This is a red and white striped barrier that is used to indicate a closed lane or a restricted area ahead on the road. This barrier is placed to guide vehicles away from the restricted zone and ensure that drivers do not enter areas where they are not allowed, for safety or regulatory reasons. When approaching this barrier, the driver of the ego car should reduce speed and prepare to follow the road as it merges or is redirected, likely into the adjoining open lanes to the left.

2.description and explanation: This is a traffic sign that appears to be a directional arrow pointing to the left. It instructs drivers to proceed in the direction indicated by the arrow. In this case, the driver of the ego car must be prepared to steer to the left, following the route as indicated by the sign. It is essential for the driver to be attentive to this sign to navigate the traffic situation correctly, especially in conjunction with the physical road barrier that is also present.

3.description and explanation: A vertical road sign displaying a blue circle with a white arrow pointing upward, indicating that the permitted direction of travel is straight ahead. The ego car should continue driving forward and must not turn in any other direction.

4.description and explanation: A barrier used to control access to an area. It is positioned across the driveway, suggesting that the path is currently closed to vehicles. The ego car should wait for the barrier to be lifted before proceeding or find an alternative route if the barrier remains closed.
